mapper.select:
select u.id, u.nickname, u.username, u.email, u.url, u.mobile, u.enabled, u.is_delete, u.create_time from user u where u.is_delete = '0'
AND u.id = #{userId}
AND u.username like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.enabled = #{enabled}
AND u.mobile like concat('%', #{mobile}, '%')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')

select distinct u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.mobile, u.enabled, u.create_time from user u left join user_role urole on u.id = urole.user_id left join sys_role r on r.id = urole.role_id where u.is_delete = '0' and (r.id != #{role.roleId} or r.id IS NULL) and u.id not in (select u.id from user u inner join user_role urole on u.id = urole.user_id and urole.role_id = #{role.roleId})
AND u.username like concat('%', #{role.username}, '%')
AND u.mobile like concat('%', #{role.mobile}, '%')
